name: ChartGen (Beta)
description:
ChartGen quickly generates real looking chart lines for designs without having to have the real data. ChartGen simulates high quality trending data, so the end result closely matches performance, analytics, and financial price charts. Every chart generated is celebrated and is given a unique name.


This is in beta at the moment. Here are the updates that I have planned:

  • Additional chart types: mountain, bar, candlestick, OHLC, pie (you can make and grab other chart types now at https://chartgen.frederickallen.co)
  • Ability to add custom data


Reach out if you have any other ideas.
